post:
Use these promocodes during sign up process

fall20 - Get 20% Off on Linux Shared Hosting on all billing periods.

southwest20 - Get 20% Off on Windows Shared Hosting on yearly and bi-annual billing periods.

standard20 - Get 20% Off on Linux VPS Hosting on all billing periods.

venus20 - Get 20% Off on Windows Hosting on all billing periods.

newjersey20 - Get 20% Off on Reseller Hosting on semi-Annual and Annual billing periods.
